util.runtime.jvm

Class JvmCmdBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.runtime.CommandLineBuilder
      • util.runtime.jvm.JvmCmdBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JarCmdBuilder, MainClassCmdBuilder

    public abstract class JvmCmdBuilder
extends CommandLineBuilder
    Base class to build commands to invoke a JVM.
    See Also:
    JarCmdBuilder, MainClassCmdBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • addProp

        public JvmCmdBuilder addProp(SysPropJvmArg... ps)
        Appends the specified properties to the existing list of JVM system property arguments. Order is preserved.
        Parameters:
        ps - the properties to add.
        Returns:
        itself for use in fluent API style.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the arguments is null.

      • addProps

        public <K,V> JvmCmdBuilder addProps(java.util.Map<K,V> props)
        Appends the specified properties to the existing list of JVM system property arguments. Filters out properties having a null or empty key or having a null value.
        Type Parameters:
        K - key type.
        V - value type.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to add.
        Returns:
        itself for use in fluent API style.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the arguments is null.

      • addCurrentSysProps

        public JvmCmdBuilder addCurrentSysProps()
        Appends the current system properties to the existing list of JVM system property arguments. Filters out properties having a null or empty key or having a null value.
        Returns:
        itself for use in fluent API style.

      • addApplicationArgument

        public JvmCmdBuilder addApplicationArgument(CommandBuilder... ps)
        Appends to the existing list of application arguments, i.e. what to pass to the main method. Order is preserved.
        Parameters:
        ps - the arguments to add.
        Returns:
        itself for use in fluent API style.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the arguments is null.
